item.title: First Post
item.description: My First Blog Post Hey, Alex here! It’s been a goal of mine to have a blog/website for little posts and thoughts that I have about things. So here it is! I’m using the static-site generator Hugo to build this. I just have to configure the theme to make the site look nice and I can write posts using markdown for formatting. I’m hosting it using GitHub Pages which is super easy and I highly recommend for static sites.
